name: Aeroplane Blaster
description:
Aeroplane blaster Become a test pilot and test the latest fighter jet to defend your country from attack! Shoot hordes of enemies with the latest weapons and upgrade your ship, collecting bonuses that will give you new opportunities. Make the path of the ship to your base through the clusters of enemies and do not come under fire! Will you be able to overcome all the deadly levels and get to the very end? Aeroplane blaster is a 2D space arcade game, destroy other fighters, aim to devastate the planet, conquer planet after planet, overcoming bosses.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack By QUE Sounds
